item.title: FYI Podcast EP86: ByteDance, TikTok, and Chinaâ€™s Growing Influence in Global Tech with Matthew Brennan
item.description: The specific tech (or AI if you may say) innovation Tiktok or Bytedance has is the combination of recommendation (customer side) and image/video tagging (content side). In addition, another key component leading to Tiktok phenomenon is the growth hacking team. KuaiShou, the main competitor of Douyin which is the Chinese version Tiktok, is more like a social media platform. Its users are more from the 3rd of 4th or even lower-tier cities, even from rural areas.
